pages.text: Stegosaurus was a herbivorous dinosaur from the Late Jurassic of North America. It had a large, bony tail and a row of bony plates along its back. Stegosaurus is one of the most well-known dinosaurs, and its distinctive appearance has made it a popular subject of art and literature.
"My brain is the size of a walnut but at least I have cool plates" â€” every Stegosaurus ever
